text: Flavius Iordanes was a Roman general and politician. He was holding the office of magister militum per Orientem when the Western Emperor Anthemius appointed him consul with Messius Phoebus Severus for 470. Category:5th-century Romans Category:5th-century Byzantine people Category:Byzantine generals Category:Imperial Roman consuls Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown
title: Flavius Iordanes
